With $37 billion in assets, the Grayscale trust GBTC is the world’s largest
Bitcoin fund. It towers over every other fund on the market. Investors have
flooded into the Grayscale trust because it owns Bitcoin…
previous.title: GBTC ETF is significantly underperforming Bitcoin. GBTC’s 2% expense ratio is generating $740 million in annualized fee income for its management!

next.title: The S&P 500 fell 2.3% on Friday, its 5th 2-3% decline of the year. This has been a relatively calm year for US equities. There has yet to be a daily decline of more than 3% - in 2020 we saw that 16 times. $SPX https://t.co/qwvNPnRnyO

localize.full_text: 金曜日のS&P 500は2.3%の下落となり、今年5回目の2～3%の下落となりました。今年は米国株にとって比較的穏やかな年であった。1日の下落率が3％を超えたことはまだありませんが、2020年には16回もありました。$SPX https://t.co/qwvNPnRnyO
S&P 500指数周五下跌2.3%，是今年第5次下跌2-3%。今年对美国股市来说是相对平静的一年。还没有出现过日跌幅超过3%的情况--在2020年我们看到了16次。$SPX https://t.co/qwvNPnRnyO
S&P 500指數週五下跌2.3%，是今年第5次下跌2-3%。今年對美國股市來說是相對平靜的一年。還沒有出現過日跌幅超過3%的情況--在2020年我們看到了16次。$SPX https://t.co/qwvNPnRnyO
